title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Brighton Recreation Area, Michigan
content:
Photo submitted by Benjamin Guettler, “Fatbiking through a winter wonderland – Frozen meadow, Found Loop at Brighton Recreation Area, Michigan.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please […]
